answers.answer: Hello.This pain and the cold feeling can be due to neuropathy or blood circulation problems. Diabetes is a common cause of peripheral neuropathy.Do you have diabetes ?Regards

question: Today my leg around my shine and ankle began to ache to the point it mad me a little queasy. Then it felt so cold and achey i touched it and it was very warm. All day it has bothered me very much. Any ideas?
title: very cold and aches
